data.title: Professor Felten on the NSA's Surveillance Database
data.meta_description: Professor Edward Felten speaks to the New York Times on how “metadata” in the NSA’s surveillance database can “reveal some of the most intimate secrets of American citizens.” To read the New York Times article entitled “N.S.A. Phone Data
data.text:
Professor Edward Felten speaks to the New York Times on how “metadata” in the NSA’s surveillance database can “reveal some of the most intimate secrets of American citizens.” To read the New York Times article entitled “N.S.A. Phone Data Collection Is Illegal, A.C.L.U. Says” or Professor Felten’s declaration, please click on the links provided.

New York Times: “N.S.A. Phone Data Collection is Illegal, A.C.L.U. Says”
